introduction: Shinji is a member of the Yamashiro clan, who makes their living from debt collection and black-market dealings.Famous for his “Violence” and “Drugs,” people called him a mad dog.He had avoided being interested in people since the loss of his precious underling.One day, a mysterious boy, Masato, appears in his life.Despite the annoyance of Masato to Shinji, Masato’s pure interest in Shinji gradually moves his heart.Because of Shinji’s mistakes in the past, Masato gets involved in an incident.The past never supports the future.They wish for a change but are unchangeable.A man who almost lost the feeling will be moved to face the change by caring about people and feeling cared for.
